d47cb42bb83b8db7d27b05cbd289c492 (14:30): 'layer-background-color' sets the color for the entire region of the current element

df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:44): In many different ways. But the general point is that you shouldnt
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): The only reason to do it right now is IE's lack of standards support
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): So for ALL browsers you should have ONE stylesheet
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): Then you add some extra for IE bugs
d47cb42bb83b8db7d27b05cbd289c492 (14:45): okay, sounds logical
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): You do this with an extra stylesheet included with a conditional comment in the html
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): `css conditional
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:45): `conditional
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:46): just google for conditional comment
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:46): But start without
d47cb42bb83b8db7d27b05cbd289c492 (14:46): okay
df52db578d711579b9cc26c94d8b3d41 (14:46): Most problems dont require browser specific solutions
